body:
`partial_sum` from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/9063 is basically exactly what you need here. But in the meantime, I think a solution based on `while_loop` could work.

In practice, I suspect `repeat` will often be used for data preprocessing outside the training loop, so the performance of gradients may not be critical.
